CustomField.description: Designates the class of OAuth2 resource. Git => various Git-based version control services (eg, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket) Salesforce => Salesforce
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Designates the class of OAuth2 resource. Git => various Git-based version control services (eg, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket) Salesforce => Salesforce
CustomField.label: Resource Class
